item.title: Vance, Hegseth, Miller drowned out by protester jeers at Union Station photo op
item.description: JD Vance joined two other Trump administration officials who received an unwarm welcome during a photo op with National Guard troops stationed at Unio...

item.title: Judge denies DOJ's request to unseal Epstein records from criminal case
item.description: A federal judge in New York has denied the Department of Justice's request to unseal grand jury material from Jeffrey Epstein's criminal case.

item.title: Hurricane Erin live updates: NC under state of emergency, Northeast beaches close
item.description: Hurricane Erin has triggered a state of emergency in North Carolina, where residents and visitors along the Outer Banks are under evacuation orders.

item.title: WATCH: Laufey plays 'This or That' with 'GMA'
item.description: The singer shared her summer hot takes as part of the 'GMA' Summer Concert Series.

item.title: WATCH: Cracker Barrel CEO discusses big changes coming to beloved restaurant chain
item.description: CEO Julie Felss Masino dishes on fan feedback, while Robin Roberts asks the question on all of our minds.
